nodes.title: Fixed typo that caused compilation failure
remove unexpected semicolon to fix compile error.
Use commonjs object export compatible syntax
Update types to add duration property
fix: android build error - replace 'implementation' with 'api'
Removed warning when compiling iOS project
This change removes the deprecation warning received whilst compiling Android
Adds typing for autoSize and enableMergePathsAndroidForKitKatAndAbove
Fixed typescript type definition export for 3.x
Cleanup framework / header search paths to fix xcode 10 build
[Android] Wait for the view to be attached when playing (fixes autoplay)
Clear animationJson property to resolve Android flickering issues
Preserve content mode when animation view is replaced
Autoplay animations when animation's source has changed

make Lottie view use the json string directly

add autoPlay property to typescript typings
Fix resizeMode for iOS and TypeScript
cacheStrategy property exposed to js layer.

Use linear easing in examples and docs
Iterators supported inside of the JSONReadableMap
removed createJSModules as it is now deprecated

add ability to import props type

feat: add support for loading animations from local paths
